name: Windfolk: Sky Is Just the Beginning
storyline: Eurian is a world at war. The Coalition seeks to control all the trydian, the priceless mineral that keeps the islands floating in the air. Esen, a soldier in the rebel forces, must face them to protect the planet and have her revenge. Windfolk is an intense action adventure where you can fly using your jetpack and battle against enemies to achieve victory.
summary: Test your flying skills. Become the fastest person in Eurian and don't let the enemies stop you. Use barrel rolls and acrobatic movements to fly as fast as you can. Battle in a unique environment where you have to keep moving in order to dodge the enemies' attacks. Combine your weapons and skills to create unique effects that will help you defeat your enemies. From the tropical seaside with floating islands to the scorching deserts that hold the ruins of an ancient civilization, discover the wonderful world of Eurian. Go behind enemy lines and explore every corner of each stage.
